Features.EasyTilling.SpeedMultiplier.Des: Change the speed at which the player tills farmland with a hoe. Acts as a direct multiplier. Min: 0.1, Max: 2.0, Default: 1.0.
Features.EasyTilling.ModMenu.lblDescript: Provides an easier way for players to till farmland, with a hoe.
Features.EasyTilling.ModMenu.lblSpeedMul: The multiplier to apply to the speed of Tilling with a hoe
